title: Unable to copy to FTP Write-Only Directories
body:
<!--

We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

**STOP and READ**
**YOUR POST WILL BE REMOVED IF IT IS LOW QUALITY**:
Please show the effort you've put into solving the problem and please be specific.
People are volunteering their time to help! Low effort posts are not likely to get good answers!

If you think you might have found a bug, try to replicate it with the latest beta (or stable).
The update instructions are available at https://rclone.org/commands/rclone_selfupdate/

If you can still replicate it or just got a question then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

for a quick response instead of filing an issue on this repo.

If nothing else helps, then please fill in the info below which helps us help you.

**DO NOT REDACT** any information except passwords/keys/personal info.

You should use 3 backticks to begin and end your paste to make it readable.

Make sure to include a log obtained with '-vv'.

You can also use '-vv --log-file bug.log' and a service such as https://pastebin.com or https://gist.github.com/

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### The associated forum post URL from `https://forum.rclone.org`

https://forum.rclone.org/t/ftp-write-only-directories/45599/10

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Inability to write to "write only directories" via FTP

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

rclone v1.68.0
- os/version: darwin 13.6.1 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 22.6.0 (x86_64)
- os/type: darwin
- os/arch: amd64
- go/version: go1.23.1
- go/linking: dynamic
- go/tags: cmount

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

MacOS Ventura 13.6.1 64 bit

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

FTP

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`/usr/local/bin/rclone copy -vv --no-check-dest --no-traverse --ignore-checksum --ignore-size --no-update-modtime --no-update-dir-modtime --ignore-times --inplace --retries 1 --low-level-retries 1 --exclude ".DS_Store" --stats 3s --log-file="/Users/TN/Documents/rclone.txt" "/Users/TN/Desktop/Testing.txt" FTP:"__Dropbox"`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
2024/09/16 10:16:11 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.68.0" starting with parameters ["/usr/local/bin/rclone" "copy" "-vv" "--no-check-dest" "--no-traverse" "--ignore-checksum" "--ignore-size" "--no-update-modtime" "--no-update-dir-modtime" "--ignore-times" "--inplace" "--retries" "1" "--low-level-retries" "1" "--stats" "3s" "--log-file=/Users/TN/Documents/rclone.txt" "/Users/TN/Desktop/Testing.txt" "FTP:__Dropbox"]
2024/09/16 10:16:11 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "/Users/TN/Desktop/Testing.txt"
2024/09/16 10:16:11 DEBUG : Using config file from "/Users/TN/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2024/09/16 10:16:11 DEBUG : fs cache: adding new entry for parent of "/Users/TN/Desktop/Testing.txt", "/Users/TN/Desktop"
2024/09/16 10:16:11 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "FTP:__Dropbox"
2024/09/16 10:16:11 DEBUG : ftp://ftp.*****.com:21/__Dropbox: Connecting to FTP server
2024/09/16 10:16:11 DEBUG : ftp://ftp.*****.com:21/__Dropbox: dial("tcp","ftp.*****.com:21")
2024/09/16 10:16:11 DEBUG : ftp://ftp.*****.com:21/__Dropbox: > dial: conn=*fshttp.timeoutConn, err=<nil>
2024/09/16 10:16:12 DEBUG : Testing.txt: Need to transfer - File not found at Destination
2024/09/16 10:16:12 DEBUG : ftp://ftp.*****.com:21/__Dropbox: dial("tcp","XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX:XXXXX")
2024/09/16 10:16:12 DEBUG : ftp://ftp.*****.com:21/__Dropbox: > dial: conn=*tls.Conn, err=<nil>
2024/09/16 10:16:12 ERROR : Testing.txt: Failed to copy: SetModTime: 550 File not found
2024/09/16 10:16:12 ERROR : Attempt 1/1 failed with 1 errors and: SetModTime: 550 File not found
2024/09/16 10:16:12 INFO  : 
Transferred:   	          0 B / 0 B, -, 0 B/s, ETA -
Errors:                 1 (retrying may help)
Elapsed time:         0.7s

2024/09/16 10:16:12 DEBUG : 6 go routines active
2024/09/16 10:16:12 DEBUG : ftp://ftp.*****.com:21/__Dropbox: closing 1 unused connections
2024/09/16 10:16:12 NOTICE: Failed to copy: SetModTime: 550 File not found
```

<!--- Please keep the note below for others who read your bug report. -->

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
